/gistchore ## Reorganized Configuration Interface

### Appearance Tab

**Three Independent Sections:**

**1. Button Border**
- Radio buttons to choose: Solid, Gradient, or None
- If Solid is selected: Show a single color picker
- If Gradient is selected: Show two color pickers (Start and End) with a small preview strip showing the gradient
- If None is selected: No additional controls

**2. Button Background** 
- Radio buttons to choose: Solid or Gradient
- If Solid is selected: Show a single color picker
- If Gradient is selected: Show two color pickers (Start and End) with a small preview strip showing the gradient

**3. Button Text**
- Radio buttons to choose: Solid or Gradient  
- If Solid is selected: Show a single color picker
- If Gradient is selected: Show two color pickers (Start and End)

**At the bottom: Combined Live Preview**
- Shows the "Ask" button with all three styles applied together (border + background + text) so you can see how they interact

---

### Content Tab Changes

**Remove:**
- "Branding Text" section completely

**Update Suggestion Categories section:**
- Replace the textarea with an input box + "Add" button at the top
- Below that, show each category as a draggable list item (with a drag handle icon like ≡)
- Each item has an X button on the right to delete it
- Items can be reordered by dragging
- Add helper text: "Drag to reorder"

---

### Behavior Tab
**Remove:**
- Preview Theme (Light/Dark) section
- Open by Default toggle

This makes the interface much clearer because each styling element (border, background, text) is controlled independently in its own section, and you immediately see all three style options without confusion about what applies where. Perfect! Now I understand. You're configuring the **collapsed "Ask" button** styling, and you want three independent controls:

## Proposed Reorganized Appearance Tab

```
┌──────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ Button Border                            │
├──────────────────────────────────────────┤
│ Style: ( ) Solid  ( ) Gradient ( ) None  │
│                                          │
│ [If Solid selected]                      │
│ Color: [🎨] #3b82f6                     │
│                                          │
│ [If Gradient selected]                   │
│ Start: [🎨] #294470                     │
│ End:   [🎨] #8b5cf6                     │
│ Preview: [gradient border preview]       │
└──────────────────────────────────────────┘

┌──────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ Button Background                        │
├──────────────────────────────────────────┤
│ Style: ( ) Solid  ( ) Gradient          │
│                                          │
│ [If Solid selected]                      │
│ Color: [🎨] #ffffff                     │
│                                          │
│ [If Gradient selected]                   │
│ Start: [🎨] #294470                     │
│ End:   [🎨] #8b5cf6                     │
│ Preview: [gradient fill preview]         │
└──────────────────────────────────────────┘

┌──────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ Button Text                              │
├──────────────────────────────────────────┤
│ Style: ( ) Solid  ( ) Gradient          │
│                                          │
│ [If Solid selected]                      │
│ Color: [🎨] #000000                     │
│                                          │
│ [If Gradient selected]                   │
│ Start: [🎨] #294470                     │
│ End:   [🎨] #8b5cf6                     │
└──────────────────────────────────────────┘

┌──────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ Live Preview                             │
│ [Ask button preview with all styles]     │
└──────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

## For Content Tab - Suggestion Categories

```
┌──────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ Suggestion Categories                    │
├──────────────────────────────────────────┤
│ [Input box: "Add category..."] [+ Add]   │
│                                          │
│ ┌────────────────────────────────────┐  │
│ │ ≡ Top Stories              [×]      │  │
│ │ ≡ Breaking News            [×]      │  │
│ │ ≡ Sports                   [×]      │  │
│ │ ≡ Technology               [×]      │  │
│ └────────────────────────────────────┘  │
│ (Drag to reorder)                        │
└──────────────────────────────────────────┘
```
